column12: "A handful of dried bloodwort and mandrake root has been bound together with leather cord and imbued with a powerful healing magic."
"Four copper rings have been joined into a tetrahedron. The construct is oddly warm to the touch."
"Various animals have been etched into the surface of this brass bangle. It emits a barely audible hum."
"Eldritch flames flicker within this polished crystal bauble."
"A jade figurine depicts a strange humanoid creature. It has a face on both sides of its head
column13: but all four eyes are closed."

column12: "Seven tiny glass eyes roll freely within this glass sphere. Somehow
column13: they always come to rest facing outward."

column12: "Sparkling dust and fragments of feather waft and swirl endlessly inside this small glass sphere."

column14: hums with an arcane energy that sets your teeth on edge."

column12: "When you touch this tiny granite statue
column13: a rhythmic booming echoes in your mind."

column12: "When you gaze into the murky interior of this obsidian cube
column13: you feel as though something predatory is watching you."

column12: "The surface of this nickel sphere has been etched with a perfect grid pattern. Somehow
column13: the squares of the grid are all exactly the same size."

column12: "A strip of bronze has been wound around a rough wooden sphere. Each time you touch it
column13: you feel a tiny electric shock."

column12: "A featureless gray disc hangs from a lanyard. When you touch it
column13: your hand and arm go numb."
